name: GtDatamodelInterface
tooltip:
Allows the registration of custom data classes
for extending the project structure.

functions.name: package
description: @brief Returns static meta objects of datamodel package.

functions.name: data
description: @brief Returns static meta objects of datamodel classes.

functions.name: standAlone
functions.tooltip: is the module standalone and has its own data model structure?
description: @brief Returns true if module is a standalone module with own data
model structure. Otherwise module only extends the overall application
with additional functionalities like classes, calculators or
